overview: Eve, a beautiful young nightclub dancer, turns down a string of wealthy and powerful suitors for Robert, a poor but ambitious young man. What Eve doesn't know is that Robert is the son of a wealthy businessman and is just pretending to be poor to see if she really loves him. However, an item in the society pages gives away Robert's true identity. Complications ensue.
tagline: If you want a real thrill here it is. A picture that takes you among the celebrities of the stage in the very heart of New York's amusement center and shows you what they do in exclusive night clubs.
title: Broadway Daddies
